services.title: Full Stack Web Development
services.text: I am a versatile full stack web developer with expertise in building dynamic web applications using the MERN stack. I specialize in front-end technologies such as React, Tailwind CSS, and Material-UI.

services.title: Recommendation Systems
services.text: Recommendation systems predict user preferences based on past interactions. I design and implement personalized recommendation systems to enhance user experience.

services.title: Image Classification
services.text: Image classification categorizes images into predefined labels. I develop machine learning models for image classification tasks, focusing on computer vision applications.

services.title: Chat Applications
services.text: Chat applications enable real-time communication between users. I build chat applications with features like messaging, file sharing, and multimedia support.

services.title: Prediction Systems
services.text: Prediction systems forecast future trends using historical data and machine learning. I specialize in developing prediction systems for various domains.

services.title: E-commerce Websites
services.text: E-commerce websites facilitate online buying and selling. I develop custom e-commerce websites tailored to specific business needs.

services.title: Delivery Services
services.text: Delivery services transport goods between locations. I develop delivery management systems to optimize routes and track shipments in real-time.
